product_name: Lowepro Photo Sport Sling 100 AW Camera Pack
long_description: The Lowepro Photo Sport Sling 100 AW camera pack is perfect for camera-toting adventurers who like to go fast and light while maintaining the ability to capture the moment on film. Distinctive sling design goes from carry mode to ready mode in seconds and is ideal for trail running, mountain biking, snowboarding and other outdoor activities. Padded camera compartment can hold a DSLR camera with kit lens attached, plus a flash. 9-liter, toploading compartment accommodates personal items such as a hat, light jacket, snack, cell phone and keys. Side-access pocket allows you to quickly rotate the pack to the front, unzip, un-cinch and access your camera. The Lowepro Photo Sport Sling 100 AW camera pack features reflective piping, a molded airflow back panel, multiple attachment points and a built-in, all-weather cover.
short_description: The Lowepro Photo Sport Sling 100 AW camera pack is perfect for camera-toting adventurers who like to go fast and light while maintaining the ability to capture the moment on film.
